name: JOBIFY WEBSITE
desc: Implemented MERN STACK framework where I built Login/Register, Stats , Add Job , All Job and Profile Page , so user can managehis/her data in the application feasibly

name: E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
desc: Developed and learned about MERN STACK framework where I built Admin area to manage customers, products & orders (CRUD) &User area to buy, search, review the products and shopping cartwith PayPal & credit/debit payments

name: 30-days-of-React
desc: Implemented and learned about React framework which is a JavaScript Library. In these 30 days, I also built clone apps using React and Firebase like Instagram Clone, WhatsApp Clone, Amazon Clone, Netflix Clone and many more things within React

name: 30-days-of-JavaScript
desc: Implemented and learned 30 different projects using HTML, CSS,Vanilla JavaScript. In these 30 days I learned about JavaScript Variables, Functions,DOM, Session Storage, Async/Await and many more things within JavaScript.

name: Fluix
desc: An application for Flutter UI's, from where developers can easily  get the awesome UI templates for basic components of an app likelogin, signup, drawers, lists and many more along with code. So youcan just copy and paste the code to get UI for your application.

name: Magic Scribble
desc: It's an fun game where users can draw, paint or also jot down quick points. But the interesting part is the way to reach to the scribble board. It is like puzzle. You have to struggle somewhat for accessing the board. This app was published on PlayStore and Amazon AppStore
